entry.title: WIND WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 10:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SSE 38 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain late this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
